radirius.merc.framework

Class Runner

  • java.lang.Object
    • radirius.merc.framework.Runner

  • public class Runner
extends Object
    The heart of MERCury. Runs the Core and provides the various materials required for your game.
    Author:
    wessles

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Runner.InitSetup
      An object that will be used for initializing the Runner with default values that can be modified.

      • init

        public void init(Runner.InitSetup iniset)
        Initializes MERCury.
        Parameters:

      • init

        public void init(Core core,
        int WIDTH,
        int HEIGHT,
        boolean fullscreen,
        boolean vsync,
        boolean initonseparatethread,
        boolean devconsole)
        Initializes the library
        Parameters:
        core - The Core to be ran.
        WIDTH - The width of the display.
        HEIGHT - The height of the display.
        fullscreen - Whether or not fullscreen is enabled.
        vsync - Whether or not v-sync is enabled.
        initonseparatethread - Whether or not the Core is initialized on a separate thread.
        devconsole - Whether or not the developers console is enabled.

      • addDebugData

        public void addDebugData(String name,
                String value)
        Adds information to the debugdata. Debug data is wiped every single update frame, so this is to be called every frame.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the debug information.
        value - The value of the debug information.
